*Regarding Neidrahu* "Midrah's preaching persuaded his followers of the awesome power of the dark arts. He often spoke of a powerful magus known as a devil, who practiced magic in Gludio. He convinced them that his own power was equal to the devil's! Information regarding Beleth, Black Magus and the pastoral history of the wasterland of Gludio was all available of his claims, eventually they believed him."
